interfaces.name: ModalRef

injectables.name: ModalService

directives.name: StringTemplateOutletDirective

components.name: AppComponent
ButtonComponent

inputsClass.name: size
inputsClass.rawdescription: How large should the button be?

components.name: CounterComponent
components.templateData: Current Count: {{ count$ | async }}

components.name: ModalComponent

{{ title }}

{{ bodyTemplate }}

variables.name: _counterReducer
variables.defaultValue:
createReducer(
  initialState,
  on(increment, state => state + 1),
  on(decrement, state => state - 1),
  on(reset, () => 0)
)
